sub_topic: The construction of the Menger sponge.
message_1:
How many squares are present in the 3rd iteration of a Menger sponge?

(Note: The 3rd iteration of a Menger sponge consists of 20 cubes and has a total of 6400 squares.)
message_2: The 3rd iteration of a Menger sponge has a total of 6400 squares.
